ygData.msgSnippet: ah..... i went to check the server status at EQVAULT. ALL server are NOT on-line! Server Timed-Out Only Patch server II is up. I was in Nro when it all went
ygData.messageBody:
ah.....
i went to check the server status at EQVAULT.
ALL server are NOT on-line! "Server Timed-Out"
Only Patch server II is up.

I was in Nro when it all went down at around 1:30pm.
Thought that i lag out. its not lag.
Something BIG is going down.

BiBi
